ygData.subject: Re: I heard about some equipment...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is happening because you are on a pvp server i think. I jumped on Rallos Zek during beta while my regular server (Fennin Ro - BLAH) was down just to
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Karen" <ka-@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] I heard about some equipment...
>Date: Mon, 31 May 1999 10:11:11 -0500
>
>From: "Karen" <ka-@...>
>
>Ok, I have a question for you all. I am a level 25 Bard on the Rallos Zek
>server. I have read with interest your emails, suggestions, and tips, but
>I
>seem to have a problem. I can not use the same songs in the same way as
>you. My sleep song puts EVERYONE but my party to sleep, including other
>players, in fact any NON Party song effects mobs and players. This is a
>real disadvantage to me I believe. Anyone on RZ with any suggestions? Or
>anyone else ? Thanks
>
>
>Infiniti
>Rallos Zek

This is happening because you are on a pvp server i think. I jumped on
Rallos Zek during beta while my regular server (Fennin Ro - BLAH) was down
just to see what it was like. Of course i was getting beat up by some pk
monk in the newbie zone, but after i made lvl 2 it actually was kinda fun. I
would sing dissonance and strafe around him, and he couldn't keep up with me
(quake skills CAN be useful in EQ I guess when fighting other players).
I also was talking to a group who wanted me to join them and had wince on.
They were panicing cuz they didn't know why they were takng damage (all of
them). Of course after I joined the group they no longer took damage. You
just have to be careful with it on Zek.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 14th Chorus
Veeshan
